description: The call recording settings for a phone number.

inbound_call_recording_enabled.description: When enabled, any inbound call to this number will be recorded.

inbound_call_recording_format.description: The audio file format for calls being recorded.

inbound_call_recording_channels.description: When using 'dual' channels, final audio file will be stereo recorded with the first leg on channel A, and the rest on channel B.
